attributes.action: Increase Alcohol Tax to pay for its' policing and its' healthcare created through abusers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The costs associated with alcohol abuse far outway any (?) benefits from its use.  The main offenders would not be able to continue abusing it to that extent if the tax is increased and the extra income would offset the costs of policing and NHS through its abuse.
